document_data.caption: A map showing the Riven Shield Shop on the High Road.
document_data.name: Riven Shield Shop
document_data.mainbody: The '''Riven Shield Shop''' was a business located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Riven Shield Shop was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on the east side of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] just south of [[Selduth Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5292}}
document_data.Services: The shop sold [[armor]] that was both mundane and [[magical]]. An ongoing joke stated that any [[shield]]s beyond repair were sent over to the [[Grinning Lion]] tavern to adorn the walls.
